702279f-a.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Avenue - 22nd Street
702279f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, north from 24th to 22nd Streets, showing the build-
ings on the west side of the avenue and the clearance on the east
side, which was created by the tearing down of numerous frame dwell-
ings. Third Avenue is being reconstructed into Brooklyn's northerly
extension of the Belt Parkway.
October 23, 1940
P. L. Sperr

702276f-a.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Avenue - 22nd Street
702276f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, north from 22nd Street, showing demolition on
both sides of the thoroughfare for the construction of the
elevated Gowantts Parkzay. Nost of the demolition was on the
e8st side of the avenue. View 3 shows the west side of the
AVeDiU6.
P. L. Sperr  pril 21, 1941
NO PEPURODUCTIONE  Views 1,2,3
